title: Noam Chomsky - 1993-05-2X - Creating a New World Order - West Belfast, Northern Ireland - Full Talk.
description:
Be sure to pick 720p for best sound and picture quality.
In May of 1993, Noam Chomsky spoke in West Belfast, Northern Ireland on the topic: Creating a New World Order.


I combined three segments together to make a single video.


The sound and video quality are top-notch.  Hats off to the crew that did a superb job.


Tags:


 
Chomsky, Ireland, 1993, Adam Smith, North-South Confrontation, Imperialism, England, Britain, United Kingdom, Thomas Jefferson, Enlightenment, socialism, corporations, classical libertarians, George Kennan, Cold War, Smedley Butler, Haiti, F.D.R., Noam Chomsky,
